Package uicontrollers.admin

Class ForecastsController

java.lang.Object
uicontrollers.admin.ForecastsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class ForecastsController extends Object implements Controller
This class serves as a controller for the forecast section of administrator dashboard.css. It is mainly used to control the operations carried out related to forecast (such as event creation, modification, removing forecasts...).
